item.description:
Mingles Lounge is one the most, if not the most popular, Karoake Clubs in Western Mass. It caters to a diverse crowd, specifically when it comes to age, race, background, and sexual preference. The all embracing environment makes singing your heart out fathomable, especially after a few drinks lol. It is also a nice dance place. So for those who may want to be the next Amerrican Idol, cut up some rug, or just have fun with other singles this is the activity for you!!!

I will stay until the last Single Mingle member leaves, so lets see who is going to be the last one standing :)
item.how_to_find_us: Mingles is not very large, will have a table for meetup
item.name: Karaoke Night
